description:
4x4 Sliders and Side Steps Provide Serious Sill Protection!

We offer a range of high-quality 4x4 sliders and side steps in Coffs Harbour from the big three brands; AFN, Rhino and Rockarmour. Let's face it, damaging your 4WD's sills while outback can become a costly exercise. In fact, depending on your vehicle, some sills aren't repairable. To combat this, we recommend fitting 4x4 sliders and side steps to give your sills the ultimate protection. Furthermore, sliders and side steps will enhance your vehicle's appearance and make it more accessible. Even when in town, side steps will help prevent damage from a pesky shopping trolly and from a careless car door. [su_spoiler title="More"]

We Fit 4x4 Sliders and Side Steps in Coffs Harbour

Not only do we sell the best slider and side step brands in Australia, but we also fit them too. First, pop into our 4x4 accessories Showroom in Coffs Harbour and our friendly 4WD experts will guide you to the ideal side step and slider solution for your vehicle. Next, once you've made your choice, we can provide a no-obligation quote to have them fitted. We have our own full 4WD workshop right here in Coffs. Finally, you can be assured, our work is fully compliant with ADR standards.

Automax 4x4 Accessories and Services

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop for everything 4WD in Coffs Harbour, we offer the following services:

  1. 4x4 Accessories advice, supply and fitting
  2. 4x4 Bullbars from Rhino, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmour and More
  3. 4x4 Rear Bars & Tow Bars including sales and fitting
  4. 4x4 Sliders and Side steps, brands we stock are AFN, Rhino, Rockarmour
  5. 4x4 Lighting. We offer the best 4WD LED Lighting by Stedi Lights
  6. 4x4 Suspension by Outback Armour and Boss Air Suspension
  7. 4x4 Winches & Recovery Gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech & Outback Armour
  8. 4x4 Vehicle repair, servicing and 4WD upgrades in Coffs Harbour
Contact us today or call into our Showroom for professional and friendly guidance on our vast range of 4x4 Sliders and Side Steps in Coffs Harbour.

[/su_spoiler]
name: ROCK SLIDERS/ STEPS
